solution_line_template: {adult_percent}% of the library books are for adults because {total_percent} - {children_percent} = <<{total_percent}-{children_percent}={adult_percent}>>{adult_percent}
There are {total_books} library books in total because {adult_books_count} / {adult_percent_decimal} = <<{adult_books_count}/{adult_percent_decimal}={total_books}>>{total_books}
